::DrillBit::

DrillBit moves to the side quickly. Puttinh distance between him and his
attackers. He turned back, shooting his gattaling gun at both of them.

::Dollen::

The shot hit him blasting him back away from the fire. He was running
low on energy, and was getting more damaged. He returned fire.
